topic.title: Applying Profiling Condition Sets in DITA

body.p: All defined Profiling Condition Sets are available as shortcuts in the Profiling / Conditional Text toolbar menu. Select a menu entry to apply the condition set. The filtered content is then grayed-out in the Author mode, Outline view, and DITA Maps Manager view (for DITA documents). Your selection will also be used as the default condition set in transformation scenarios. An element is filtered-out when one of its attributes is part of the condition set and its value does not match any of the value covered by the condition set.
